hooks.command: bash -c 'if [[ "$TOOL_INPUT" =~ \.ts$ ]]; then cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)" && npm run lint --workspace=@a5c-ai/babysitter-sdk -- --fix 2>/dev/null || true; fi'
bash -c 'if [[ "$TOOL_INPUT" =~ (package-lock\.json|pnpm-lock\.yaml)$ ]]; then echo "BLOCK: Lock files should not be edited directly. Use npm/pnpm commands instead." && exit 1; fi'
